steps.title: Discovery and goals
steps.view:
We listen first, dive into context and data, and mark bottlenecks. Then we define measurable goals.
This gives the team a shared focus and clear expectations.

steps.title: Architecture and fast checks
steps.view:
We assemble the solution: architecture, prototypes, event analytics. Early hypothesis checks save time and budget.
We build for scale and security from the start.

steps.title: Launch and scale
steps.view:
We launch an MVP with monitoring and alerts. We iterate by metrics and scale what actually works.
Reliability is not optional — it is the default.
